name: Sniping Suit
description: Cuffs specially designed for archery, and equipped with a device to help stretch muscles, Causing each arrow to inflict deadly damage on the enemy.
effect: Attack Spd ＋6%,[Sniping Suit IV] ＋[Malang Snow Crab IV]: Agi ＋5, Crit.Dmg ＋10%

name: Sniping Suit [1]
description: Cuffs specially designed for archery, and equipped with a device to help stretch muscles, Causing each arrow to inflict deadly damage on the enemy.
effect: Attack Spd ＋6%,[Sniping Suit IV] ＋[Malang Snow Crab IV]: Agi ＋5, Crit.Dmg ＋10%

name: Snow Crystal
description: The snow falling from the sky condenses together to form a giant crystal. The snow crystal usually maintains a hexagonal shape, giving people a heart-felt feeling.

name: Snow Poring Hat
description: Although Poring looks like a cold creature, but this hat is really warm!

name: Snowflake Beard
description: Once you wearing it, you will become a part of Santa Claus. Maybe some Reindeer will treat you nicely.

name: Snowman
description: Cute White Elf. Partly made of special materials, the cute white elves will gather at Gingerbread City and eat the well baked cookies of the adventurer on Christmas Day.

name: Soft Feather
description: When you don't want to get up in the early hours, They are like a warm bed surrounding you. These feathers are both tempting and magical. Being a very rare item, They can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Solar Sword [2]
description: A sword with the image of sun. With strong vitality and fighting tendencies.

name: Solar Sword [3]
description: A sword with the image of sun. With strong vitality and fighting tendencies.

name: Songkran Goggles
description: Put on this pair of swim goggles and become a shining star on the beach! Enjoy the Songkran festival, adventurer!
effect: Dmg to Water Monsters +3%,Dmg Reduction from Water Monsters +3%
